content: + braids of grass + by tiffany workman brassica materials yarn 1 skein cascade yarns baby alpaca chunky in color mustard #591 needles us 9 & 10 circular needles 16 us 10 dpns other yarn needle for weaving in ends and one stitch marker gauge 17 sts over 4 in stockinette on larger needles abbreviations co cast on sts stitches pm place marker k knit p purl k2tog knit two stitches together bobble bind off notes while in section of crown decreases when your knitting becomes too tight switch over to your size 10 dpn needles to finish directions with smaller circular needles co 72 sts and join to knit in the round row 1 pm k2 p4 around repeat this 2x4 ribbing until piece measures 5 inches from co edge body switch to larger circular needles and knit all stitches until piece measures 8 inches from co edge crown decreases 1 k7 k2tog around 2 and all even row until the bolded row knit all sts 3 k6 k2tog around 5 k5 k2tog around 7 k4 k2tog around 9 k3 k2tog around 11 k2 k2tog around 12 k1 k2tog around 13 k2tog around leaving a long tail cut yarn and pass through remaining sts weave in ends and lightly block if desired blocking will add a bit more slouch your use of this pattern constitutes your agreement to use this pattern only for personal non-profit use without specific written permission from the designer items made from this pattern may not be sold nor may the pattern or photographs themselves be copied sold or distributed in any way whether hard or electronic
